stories.text:
Is there any place online where one can discuss deep technical aspects and questions?
Most if the stuff I need to discuss with anyone is either complex or relatively deep.
Itâ€™s always been an issue. But today most sites I used over the years have become awful (stackoverflow) or too shallow (hn).
If there is a place for like minded people, then please invite me in.
In a community of people that eager to learn there will always be added value for everybody. IMHO
stories.title: Ask HN: A Place for Programmers

stories.text: This is pretty cool but it might not be revolutionary. A change and upgrade from purely text-only labels, I can now add a bit of emotional flair or warmth. It's pretty cool. It might have always been possible but I just discovered it today :)
